metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:1425-1 -- Recommended update for hyper-v
metadata.description:
This update for Hyper-V fixes the following issues:
* Fix a bug in version negotiation code for util (bnc#828714) * Cache FQDN in kvp_daemon to avoid timeouts (bnc#828714) * Fix send/recv buffer allocation (bnc#828714) * Set BOOTPROTO=static if any IPADDR/IP6ADDR was passed to hv_set_ifconfig and dhcp is disabled * Merge fixes from upstream hv_kvp_daemon (up to 3.11-rc1) * Fix a bug in IPV6 subnet enumeration (bnc#828714) * Skip restart_on_update with old hyper-v.rpms while old kernel is running (bnc#770763)
